A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILERS!!!\n\nWhat they did to Luke's character stoops to a new low in the franchise.  Poor to useless sub-plots\, weak character development and incomprehensible choices make this a poor movie.  Kylo is so Gen-X it's pitiful; we get it\, you're conflicted but make an f'in choice for once in your life for god's sake.  I give it one star for the actors\, who did a great job despite\, and the special effects.  The only character I really had any pity for was Snoke for having to deal with Kylo's sorry a$$.
